Comment 3: 
The spec places 2 _restrictions_ on goto statements, but has also a general label scope
requirement. The section on label scopes ( http://localhost:7777/ref/spec#Label_scopes )
says clearly:

"The scope of a label is the body of the function in which it is declared and excludes
the body of any nested function."

This program does not satisfy the scope requirement; the outer label is not in scope.

Both compilers and gotype do the right thing.
_Status changed to **Invalid**._
